Package ca.openosp.openo.messenger.data

package ca.openosp.openo.messenger.data
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ContactIdentifier
    Composite identifier class for messaging contacts across healthcare facilities in the OpenO EMR system.
    MessengerSystemMessage
    Data model for system-generated messages within the OpenO EMR messaging framework.
    MsgAddressBook
    Deprecated.
    This class is deprecated in favor of newer messaging implementations that provide better separation of concerns and modern UI frameworks
    MsgAddressBookMaker
    Utility class for generating and updating the hierarchical address book XML for the messaging system.
    MsgDisplayMessage
    Data transfer object for displaying messages in the OpenO EMR messaging system interface.
    MsgMessageData
    Deprecated.
    Use the MessagingManager for new implementations.
    MsgProviderData
    Data model representing a healthcare provider in the messaging system.
    MsgReplyMessageData
    Deprecated.
    This class is no longer needed in the current messaging implementation.
